name: Sun Bum SPF 50 Baby Sun Lotion 88ml
description: Little one’s have sensitive skin, and Sun Bum developed a sunscreen that's engineered to protect a baby’s thinner skin from damaging UV.Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection.Water-resistant rating of 80 minutes.Gluten, paraben, and petroleum free.Ingredients: zinc oxide (20%), water, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil, butyloctyl salicylate, diheptyl succinate, methyl dihydroabietate, butyrospermum parkii (shea butter), capryloyl glycerin/sebacic acid copolymer, sodium stearoyl glutamate, cetearyl alcohol, theobroma cacao (cocoa) seed butter, sodium hyaluronate, bisabolol, tocopherol, coco-glucoside, microcrystalline cellulose, cellulose gum, cetyl alcohol, arachidyl alcohol, behenyl alcohol, arachidyl glucoside, polyhydroxystearic acid, sodium gluconate, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin and citric acid.
